message: Hi Bob, I'm happy to offer you this product for $18,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond the asking price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Can you meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $18,000 represents the true value of this product, I'm willing to come down to $14,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $12,000?
